hero.title: Leone Pavan Developments
hero.subtitle: Commitment, quality and excellence since 2004.
hero.intro: Since 2004, when it started its activities, Leone Pavan Developments has taken a serious approach to every project. With highly qualified professionals, first-rate materials and state-of-the-art technology, we constantly evolve and refine our processes.

intro.title: Building our history
intro.text: Since 2004, Leone Pavan Developments has been creating residential projects that combine strategic vision, construction rigor and respect for time. Our trajectory follows the urban evolution of Balneário Camboriú and the Santa Catarina coast, always guided by responsible decisions and commitment to quality at every stage.
intro.text2: We build with the conviction that true value lies in consistency: in careful site selection, precise execution and delivery of developments prepared to remain relevant over the years.

history.title: Our Journey
history.text: Each delivered development represents more than a completed project. It represents progress in brand maturity, process refinement and consolidation of our own construction standards.

foundation.text: Foundation of Leone Pavan Developments in Balneário Camboriú, focused on residential projects with a clear mission: building with responsibility, criteria and long-term vision.

mirante.text: Mirante do Atlântico marks the company's entry into the high-standard segment, with a project that values views, location and rigorous technical execution.

consolidation.text: Consolidation in Balneário Camboriú with deliveries such as Vila Esperança and Portal dos Municípios, reinforcing brand presence in strategic areas of the city.

bombinhas.text: Expansion to Bombinhas with Palazzo del Mare, broadening operations on the Santa Catarina coast and strengthening positioning in premium locations.

today.text: Mature portfolio in Santa Catarina, institutional strengthening and new projects aligned with urban evolution and demands of a more conscious and demanding market.

balneario.title: Balneário Camboriú
balneario.text: A city full of charms, Balneário Camboriú daily presents its residents and visitors with exuberant beauty. Natural landscapes ranging from beaches to Atlantic Forest, combined with excellent infrastructure, make the city a vibrant place full of life — an excellent choice both to live and invest.

closing.title: Follow the Future of Our Story
closing.text: For more than two decades, Leone Construtora has transformed Santa Catarina's skyline with projects synonymous with safety and sophistication. We invite you to explore our delivered developments and upcoming launches, where every square meter is planned to exceed expectations and elevate your lifestyle.
